properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 9 at 3:05PM CST until February 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE AREA MONDAY INTO
THEUSDAY...

The National Weather Service in Jackson has expanded the

* Flash Flood Watch to include Catahoula Parish in Northeast
Louisiana.

* From Monday morning through Tuesday afternoon

* Storm total rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are expected
with locally higher amounts possible.

* Areas of flash flooding are likely. Numerous roads may be
flooded and possibly closed. Structures will be threatened
with inundation. Moderate river flooding is also possible.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should flash flood warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
